summary: Makes skyrim look more medieval, replacing some of the soldiers armor and weapon
descriptionHtml:
I do not recommend you download this mod, yet, but if you are interested track the file.
only the meshes are working correctly as standalone for the soldiers.
--What will this mod do:
By replacing the mesh and texture of the imperial and Stormcloak armors and even some weapons my goal is to make Skyrim look more medieval using some The Witcher 2 mods.
I\'m not going to work super hard on this, I\'m just going to do it on my time and the best I can.
Procrastination will probably take over.

-Replace Imperial armors, sword and shield;
-Replace Stormcloak armor;
-Replace common steel weapon.

--Notes:
-If anyone is interested to help me with some minor or not so minor improvements let me know. 
-I didn\'t had much more time to work on the mod yet, but I\'ll do what i can this weekend.
-I\'m possibly going to change all of the guard\'s armor from the different holds to knight armor with custom high-res shields.


--Working on right now:
-All the meshes are working, not all the textures,I\'ll do what I can wen I have the time.
-Imperial sword will be changed for a better fitting one.
-The shields will be replaced, imperial as a priority.
-The Thalmor armors will also be replaced. 

--What will this mod use:

Hedge knight armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13961

The Witcher 2 Models
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588

Blue Stripes Commando
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7807

Witcher 2 Shield Pack 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7328

Witcher 2 Helmet Pack
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7159

JaySuS Swords
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1002
author: gotima
